column1: Based on a recent report on the relatedness between depressed mood, as assessed by the Beck Depression Inventory (BDI), and personality according to Cloningers Temperament and Character Inventory (TCI), we attempted to replicate those findings in a sample of normal subjects (n=850) and depressive inpatients (n=353) taking into account age, gender and various aspects of depressive symptoms by means of BDI factors.
